function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in streaming services, social media use, remote work applications, and gaming","Impact":"Higher likelihood of spreading contagious diseases due to increased indoor activities and close interactions","Mitigation":"Promotion of outdoor activities, ventilation systems improvement, and public health education","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV disinfection, HEPA filters","People":"General public, office workers, gamers, social media users","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, building owners"},{"Description":"Increased use of electronics and internet services in residential buildings","Impact":"Higher indoor air pollution and close indoor interactions leading to disease spread","Mitigation":"Regular indoor air quality monitoring, promotion of outdoor activities, and ventilation system maintenance","Technologies":"Air quality monitors, smart thermostats, ventilation systems","People":"Residents, family members, visitors","Owner":"Residential building owners, local health authorities"},{"Description":"Increased use of household appliances and indoor cooking","Impact":"Increased indoor air pollution and close indoor interactions leading to disease spread","Mitigation":"Promotion of outdoor cooking, use of exhaust fans, and indoor air quality monitoring","Technologies":"Smart kitchen appliances, exhaust fans, indoor air quality monitors","People":"Residents, family members, visitors","Owner":"Residential building owners, local health authorities"}]}
